page.description: The AlphaSportsWeb application contains the following A5W and HTML web pages.

case.title: A5_INFO.A5W
case.description: Administrative users use the A5_INFO.A5W page to display information about the Application Server and current sessions.

case.title: ASWCUSTDET.A5W
case.description: Administrative users use the ASWCUSTDET.A5W page to view or edit a single customer record.

case.title: ASWCUSTOMERS.A5W
case.description: Application administrators use the ASWCUSTOMERS.A5W page to maintain customer records.

case.title: ASWCUSTONE.A5W
case.description: Application administrators users use the ASWCUSTONE.A5W page to view a single customer record.

case.title: ASWCUSTSEC.A5W
case.description: Application administrators users use the ASWCUSTSEC.A5W page to view a single customer's security record.

case.title: ASWINVOICES.A5W
case.description: The application administrator users the ASWINVOICES.A5W page to select, view, and print the details of invoices.

case.title: ASWMAINT.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWMAINT.A5W page to select various file maintenance actions.

case.title: ASWMAINTOPT.A5W
case.description: The ASWMAINTOPT.A5W page runs the maintenance operation selected in the ASWMAINT.A5W page.

case.title: ASWPACKREINDEX.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWPACKREINDEX.A5W page to pack or reindex the tables used by the AlphaSports Web application.

case.title: ASWPRINTRPT.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWPRINTRPT.A5W page to select a report to print.

case.title: ASWPROCESSING.A5W
case.description: The ASWPROCESSING.A5W page displays a frame set. The upper frame's content shows the system is "processing". The lower frame contains a page that is performing a maintenance operation.

case.title: ASWPRODONE.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWPRODONE.A5W page to view or edit a product record.

case.title: ASWPRODUCTS.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWPRODUCTS.A5W to input, edit, and delete product records.

case.title: ASWSALESHIST.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWSALESHIST.A5W page to review the number of unit sales for products and the number of sales to customers.

case.title: ASWSEARCH.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWSEARCH.A5W page to find the value of any field in any record in the customers, products, and invoices tables.

case.title: ASWSENDEMAIL.A5W
case.description: The application administrator would use the ASWSENDEMAIL.A5W page to send an email, presumably to someone in the customer table.

case.title: ASWSPECLIST.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWSPECLIST.A5W page to add, edit, and delete special (sale) prices.

case.title: ASWUPLOADIMG.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWUPLOADIMG.A5W page to add a new image to a rpoduct record.

case.title: ASWUSERGET.A5W
case.description: ASWUSERGET.A5W contains logic to determine if a logged in user has an employee record.

case.title: ASWUSERLIST.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWUSERLIST.A5W page to show a list of internal users.

case.title: ASWUSERONE.A5W
case.description: An internal user opens the ASWUSERONE.A5W page to view or edit his or her user name and password.

case.title: ASWVENDONE.A5W
case.description: The ASWVENDONE.A5W page provides a vendor lookup function for the GRD_LKVEN grid component, which is used when the application administrator is editing or adding a product record.

case.title: ASWVENDORS.A5W
case.description: The application administrator uses the ASWVENDORS.A5W page to add, edit, or delete vendor records.

case.title: CHECKOUTCALC.A5W
case.description: The CHECKOUTCALC.A5W page performs the final processing of an order. It updates tables, generates an invoice, optionally prints the invoice for the customer, and subtracts the items sold from inventory.

case.title: CheckOutCalcPayPal.A5W
case.description: The CheckOutCalcPayPal.A5W page performs the final processing of an order. It updates tables, generates an invoice, optionally prints the invoice for the customer, and subtracts the items sold from inventory. This variation of the CHECKOUTCALC.A5W page pairs with the CheckOutCompPayPal.A5W page to illustrate the use of PayPal.

case.title: CHECKOUTCART.A5W
case.description: The CHECKOUTCART.A5W page is the first page in the checkout process. The page verifies the product quantities the shopping cart, then sets a session variable to track the progress of the check out process.

case.title: CHECKOUTCOMP.A5W
case.description: The CHECKOUTCOMP.A5W is the 3rd page in the checkout process. The customer provides credit card payment information on this page.

case.title: CheckOutCompPayPal.A5W
case.description: The CheckOutCompPayPal.A5W is the 3rd page in the checkout process. The customer provides credit card payment information on this page. This variation of the CHECKOUTCOMP.A5W page pairs with the CheckOutCalcPayPal.A5W page to illustrate the use of PayPal.

case.title: CHECKOUTREGISTER.A5W
case.description: The CHECKOUTREGISTER.A5W page is an optional fourth step in the checkout process. It allows a new customer to enter security information to register..

case.title: CHECKOUTUSER.A5W
case.description: The CHECKOUTUSER.A5W page is the second step in the checkout process. It allows the customer to enter shipping and billing information.

case.title: CUSTOMER.A5W
case.description: A customer uses the CUSTOMER.A5W page to edit his or her contact, shipping, and billing information. The which requires a login. It contains saved information about the current logged on customer.

case.title: FRAMEEXIT.A5W
case.description: The AlphaSportsWeb application uses the FRAMEEXIT.A5W page to exit from an inner frame in a frame set. In AlphaSportsWeb frame sets display a header in the upper frame, while a processing page in the lower frame is doing some sort of computation.

case.title: INDEX.A5W
case.description: INDEX.A5W is the first page that AlphaSportsWeb displays. The page contains a list of product categories, a random list of 3 products on sale, and the NAV_MAIN navigation component, which allows the user to login to administrative pages.

case.title: INVDETAIL.A5W
case.description: The INVDETAIL.A5W page displays a printable version of an invoice.

case.title: LOGGEDINVALUES.A5W
case.description: LOGGEDINVALUES.A5W page finds values for an existing logged in user.

case.title: LOGIN.A5W
case.description: LOGIN.A5W is the main login page for all users.

case.title: LOGINLIST.A5W
case.description: LOGINLIST.A5W is a demonstration page to show a list of users initially configured in the security system.

case.title: NOTALLOWED.A5W
case.description: NOTALLOWED.A5W will be shown to a logged in user if they don't have permssion to see a requested page

case.title: PROCESSHEADER.A5W
case.description: The PROCESSHEADER.A5W page displays content that indicates that the application is working.

case.title: PRODUCTLIST.A5W
case.description: A customer uses the PRODUCTLIST.A5W page to display a list of products with thumbnail pictures and prices and to purchase an item by clicking the shopping cart image.

case.title: SALESHIST.A5W
case.description: A customer view the SALESHIST.A5W page to view his or hear sales history.

case.title: SEARCH_UDF.A5W
case.description: The SEARCH_UDF.A5W page contains the search code used by the ASWSEARCH.A5W page

case.title: SHOPCART.A5W
case.description: A customer views the SHOPCART.A5W to see the items selected for purchase.

case.title: SHOPCART_ADD.A5W
case.description: The SHOPCART_ADD.A5W page displays in a popup window to confirm that the customer has added an item to the shopping cart.

case.title: SHOPCART_UDF.A5W
case.description: The SHOPCART_UDF.A5W page provides functions for the shopping cart.

case.title: SPECIALS.A5W
case.description: A customer displays the SPECIALS.A5W page to view all products on sale.

case.title: TEMPLATEINT.A5W
case.description: We used TEMPLATEINT.A5W to simplify and speed the development process.

case.title: TEMPLATEPUBLIC.A5W
case.description: We used TEMPLATEPUBLIC.A5W to simplify and speed the development process.

case.title: TOPPAGE.A5W
case.description: The TOPPAGE.A5W page contains the page header.

case.title: UNDERCONSTRUCT.A5W
case.description: The AlphaSportsWeb application displays the UNDERCONSTRUCT.A5W page when the user attempts to display an unfinished page.

case.title: ERRORPAGE.HTM
case.description: The AlphaSportsWeb application displays ERRORPAGE.HTM only if a parameter sent to a page is missing or incorrect.

case.title: PAGE_NOT_FOUND.HTM
case.description: PAGE_NOT_FOUND.HTM is a sample page that could be used to redirect from a 404 server error

case.title: PROCESSING.HTM
case.description: The PROCESSING.HTM page is a frameset used to show a header while a page within the frameset is processing.
